title: Pet friendly community in Morrow. 1 BD / 1 BA. Call for tour!
posting_body: ['Spring Lake Apartments', '7000 Southlake Pkwy', 'Morrow, GA 30260', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '696 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1507', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '◾ Balcony/Patio', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Custom Paint Tone', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Linen Closets', '◾ Spacious Sunrooms', '◾ Storage Units', '◾ W/D Connections', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Brushed Nickel Lighting', '◾ Customized Designer Kitchens', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '◾ Granite Inspired Countertops', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Refrigerator and Freezer/Ice Maker', '◾ Renovated Suites Available', '◾ Roommate Style Floor Plans Available', '◾ Separate Dining Areas', 'Property Description:', 'Spring Lake Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within minutes from Clayton State University, but we are also minutes from Southlake Mall, Piedmont Henry Hospital, Gillem Logistics Center, and numerous shops and restaurants.', 'We are only a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'Property Amenities:', '◾ Clothes Care Center', '◾ Clubhouse w/WIFI', '◾ Clubroom', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Package Receiving', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Waterfront', '◾ Community Playground', '◾ Flexible Lease Terms', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Picnic Areas & Gazebos', '◾ Picnic Pavilion with Grills', '◾ Relaxing Community Lake', '◾ Relaxing Community Lake & Pavilion', '◾ Resort Inspired Pool', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'Spring Lake Apartments is a pet-friendly community that welcomes two pets per apartment home.', 'The pet fee is $300 non-refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'Please call our community for complete pet', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '8B8C04265B4044E']
